Articles.Content:
There are 88.xxx science on my station in kerbin orbit and it has an antenna and energy.
In 1.0.4 i transmitted a total of around 2000 science from that very lab, so im sure it was functional.

I canÃ‚Â´t transmit the science from my station-lab since 1.0.5
I tried both antenna settings.
If i click transmit on the antenna the antenna opens and closes without transmitting.
If i click transmit on the Lab nothing happens. Edited November 18, 2015 by Gooru

Hi Gooru, we need more information from you to solve this issue.

There should be a message on the screen when you transmit, whether successful or not, please get a screen shot of this message, put the screenshot on imgur.

Also, upload your logs from attempting to transmit science, and the save file you are using.

[quote name='Gooru']There are 88.xxx science on my station in kerbin orbit and it has an antenna and energy.
In 1.0.4 i transmitted a total of around 2000 science from that very lab, so im sure it was functional.

I canÃ‚Â´t transmit the science from my station-lab since 1.0.5
I tried both antenna settings.
If i click transmit on the antenna the antenna opens and closes without transmitting.
If i click transmit on the Lab nothing happens.[/QUOTE]

This is a known issue with Science Alert. You wouldn't happen to have that mod installed, would you? There is a patch in their thread.
Thanks, problem solved. Sorry for wrong support forum.
